pages.text: $(li)The Bottle o' Enchanting contain a strange magic inside.$(br)$(li)It can be thrown to the ground to generate Experience Orbs that you can absorb to earn Experience and level up.$(br)$(li)This experience can be used in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/enchanting_table)Enchanting Table$(/l) or in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l) too.

$(li)Those Bottles can be found in Loot Chests.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/hunger)Hungers$(/l) may drop them upon death.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/cleric)Clerics$(/l) will exchange them by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) too.
